R

randomDie(int) - Method in class snakes.game.View
This method creates random poison/toxic food units across the map that the snake traverses.
randomFood(int) - Method in class snakes.game.View
This method creates a random food across the map that the snake traverses.
removing() - Method in class snakes.game.Snake
Removes the snake's body from the game.
resetNumberOfPlayers() - Method in class snakes.game.Model
 
resume() - Method in class snakes.game.AudioFilePlayer
This method resumes the music after it has been paused The notify method is called whenever the music has been resumed
resume() - Method in class snakes.game.AudioFileSkeleton
An abstract method resume, used by the AudioFilePlayer class, and filled in with the implementation in that class.
RIGHTDIRECTION - Static variable in class snakes.game.Model
 
rightPressed(String) - Method in class snakes.game.Model
Manages the movement of the players' snakes.
row() - Method in class snakes.game.RowCol
This final method returns the row's coordinate.
RowCol - Class in snakes.game
Creates a simple Row and column coordinates object, which handles Cartesian coordinates on a 2D plane.
RowCol(int, int) - Constructor for class snakes.game.RowCol
A parameterized constructor which takes and sets the attributes of an instance of the RowCol class.
RowCol(RowCol) - Constructor for class snakes.game.RowCol
A copy constructor which takes another RowCol object's attributes and copys it into a new RowCol object.
runner() - Static method in class snakes.game.AudioFilePlayer
This is a static method which has an anonymous inner class inside of it.
runServer() - Static method in class snakes.game.Networking
This method handles establishing a connection between a client and a server through a network socket, then reading and writing to that server through an input and output stream.
